channel.title: CVE Feed for podpirate -- ACF Quick Edit Fields
channel.description: The latest CVEs for podpirate -- ACF Quick Edit Fields

item.title: CVE-2023-7286|2024-10-16T18:05:43.218Z -- podpirate -- acf%20quick%20edit%20fields
item.description: The plugin ACF Quick Edit Fields for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in versions up to, and including, 3.2.2. This makes it possible for attackers without the edit_users capability to access metadata of other users, this includes contributor-level users and above.

item.title: CVE-2023-7286|2024-10-16T06:43:32.686Z -- podpirate -- acf%20quick%20edit%20fields
item.description: The plugin ACF Quick Edit Fields for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in versions up to, and including, 3.2.2. This makes it possible for attackers without the edit_users capability to access metadata of other users, this includes contributor-level users and above.
